lead_paragraph: The Belgian cyclist Frederiek Nolf was found dead in his Doha hotel room hours before the start of the fifth stage of the Tour of Qatar. Nolf, 21, was found in his bed by his roommate Kristof Gooddaert, the Belgian team Topsport Vlaanderen Mercator said. The cause of death was not immediately known. The team quit the Qatar tour and planned to return to Belgium.
